    • Method Detail

      • evalPoints

        public int evalPoints(Player player)
        The points are evaluated as it follows: all the values of the colored dice in the player's window are added. The result value represents the points given to the player by this objective
        Specified by:
        evalPoints in class ObjectiveCard
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose points must be evaluated
        Returns:
        the points given by this card to the player
